summary: In early Republican China, rumors were going around about the treasure in Wudang Mountain. An American conspirator took his well-trained kung fu daughter to Wudang by sponsoring a Taoist martial arts competition, to steal the treasure.
cast: Wenzhuo Zhao|Mi Yang|Siu-Wong Fan|Yu-Hang To|Jiao Xu|Hee Ching Paw|Shaun Tam|Yujuan Wu
title: Da Wu Dang zhi tian di mi ma
